title: The Ambitious Lives of Evan Sanderson
description: Evan Sanderson seems to be living a charmed life. He is a successful doctor, is respected in the community, and has a beautiful wife.Evan accomplished what he has because he has a burning ambition to achieve, to be the best.At the end of his life, he wonders if he did enough. Will people remember him when he is dead? He has a terrible feeling he has not accomplished what he wanted.Evan lives in Middle Falls, where second--and third--chances abound, soÂ he will have more opportunities to get to where he longs to be. Or will his ambition turn in new directions?The Ambitious Lives of Evan Sanderson is the nineteenth book in the Middle Falls Time Travel Series. It can be read as a standalone novel, or as part of the series.
author: Shawn Inmon
